name: Race withoot a caar
description:
YOU NEED JAVA TO RUN!

This is my entry for the GMTK game jam. It is a racing game but you don't have a car so you have to jump on top of other peoples cars. I only had 3 hours to work on it for various reasons. I know it won't win no matter what but it was fun to make and thats all that matters for this right?
